name: ax-pre-ltadd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), cltrr, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
comment: Ordering property of addition on reals. Axiom 20 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-ltadd . Normally new proofs would use ~ axltadd . (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
